fields.description:
This will be more "correct". We'll need a corresponding docs ticket to change refs there as well.
"clshost" -> "ufshost"
"clsport" -> "ufsport"

As part of this, should we remove support for separate hosts for each service? Each UFS host is required to have all services running and so we only need a single config item here.
fields.summary: change clchost to ufshost in console.ini

comments.body: https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1402

If we remove the config settings for the separate hosts, we'll need to update the relevant entries at https://www.eucalyptus.com/docs/eucalyptus/4.1.0/index.html#shared/console_config_locating_config_file.html
[~dkavanagh], please open linked doc ticket for this.
[~gholms], [~viglesias], what upgrade issues should we concern with?
We should support both for at least 1 release.
OK, I'll modify the PR.
[~dkavanagh]: Heads up that there are merge conflicts in PR 1402, likely caused by the recent merge of PR 1401 for GUI-1722
updated PR
dang, need to support old value still.. forgot
ok, finally ready!
[~dkavanagh]: Your updates look good, but we should log (via logging.WARN) the fact that clchost/clcport are deprecated in 4.2, perhaps using the notice I entered in an earlier comment.

Logging that creates a TON of warning messages in the logs since we look for those with every request. I guess filling up the logs might be a good way to get people to switch! :-)

Solved that problem by adding the check in config.py check_config()
[~tvo], will need to update docs based on this change. Would you mind opening whatever tickets you need and linking to this ticket? Thanks!
Sure. See DOC-1597!
PR 1402 merged
https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1427
PR 1427 merged

Verified.  clchost is now ufshost in console.ini
